texts.value: Acts as a transcriptional corepressor for AR-mediated transactivation function. May act as a transcriptional regulator during spermatogenesis and, in particular, during meiotic division
Acts as a transcriptional coactivator for AR-mediated transactivation function. May act as a transcriptional regulator during spermatogenesis and, in particular, during meiotic division
Homodimer. Heterodimer of isoform 1 and isoform 2. Isoform 1 and isoform 2 interact with AR
May be produced at very low levels due to a premature stop codon in the mRNA, leading to nonsense-mediated mRNA decay

comments.note: Contaminating sequence. Potential poly-A sequence starting in position 1214.
